name: Daydreamer (itch) (Tigermon)
description:
This is my submission for the Brackey's Gamejam 2022.1

It's a small game with just 3 level, but it works (i hope)

You play as a guy who's on his way to work. The twist is: He slowly falls asleep and you have to keep him awake with anti-sleeping-pills, coffeecups and energydrinks or else his environment turns hostile.

Hope you enjoy.
